LanguageData.BS_HuntDescription: Track down and attack nearby foes. Any abilities on auto-cast (right-click) will be automatically used.
LanguageData.BS_TakeCoverDescription: Automatically try to move into cover while in combat.
LanguageData.BS_MeleeChargeDescription: Charge a long distance to reach seen threats / Charge only a very short distance (when off).
LanguageData.BS_AutoUseAllAbilitiesDescription:
Toggle automatic use of ALL abilities.

Note: you can hide this button in the setting and instead simply right-click the Auto-Combat button.

This was mostly added because some users wasn't aware of the included ability to auto-cast.
